SELECT * FROM(SELECT c.user_id, u.nickname, u.avatar, c.reply_id, r.nickname AS reply_nickname, c.id, c.parent_id, c.comment_content, c.create_time, row_number () over ( PARTITION BY parent_id ORDER BY create_time ASC ) row_num FROM tb_comment c JOIN tb_user u ON c.user_id = u.user_id JOIN tb_user r ON c.reply_id = r.user_id WHERE c.is_delete = 0 AND parent_id IN ( #{commentId} )) t WHERE 4 > row_num
